There is a lingering smell of white vine: "After the eight thieves were executed, I read the whole text, although it is The Devil, there are some good points, I am pleased. So I thought for seven days, erased the original text, blended the works of the thieves with my lifelong learning, and carved them into six rooms."
"These six rooms, the first is sword, the second is Confucianism, the third is Buddhism, the fourth is Taoism, the fifth is Longevity, the sixth is devil."
(Long...Longevity! Is it true? If this is known by some princes and ambitious people, wouldn't it cause chaos in the world and there will be no peace?)
"What a pity! What a pity! I don't know the way of the military, the art of numbers, otherwise I would have eight families, wouldn't they correspond one by one?"

(The great hero also has a bit of obsessive-compulsive disorder? But he knows martial arts, Confucianism, Buddhism, Taoism, as well as the way of longevity and the devil, he is already a learned person in the world.)

There is a lingering smell of white vine: Hmm... I've read it all.

"These eight people, Fu Yaozi disregarded the contradiction of lifespan, falsely claimed to be a friend of the founding emperor, and arbitrarily decided the martial arts of the Central Plains. Zhong Yangzi is the head of the Taoist Sect, forcibly twisting the old and the new, and arbitrarily seizing the way of heaven."

"Hui Yuan presides over Shifa Temple, sits on the land, and hides evil in his heart. Jian Chi, as the Pavilion Master of Langya Sword Pavilion, only cares about the Appliance, not the people's livelihood. Tang Tai Jun, the Manor Lord of Beast Manor, respects beasts and belittles humans."
"Chu Kuangsheng, the head of Nine Factions Sect, acts on his likes and dislikes, and takes human lives lightly. Yan Gexing, the deputy of Nine Factions Sect, is short-sighted and acts on impulse."
This seems to be an introduction, could it be that Blood Rakshasa still thinks that future generations will come here for a visit?
"The tomb of Horse, a man from the Zhao Kingdom, who died under the fan of He Gao Fu. Once a traitor, he died at the hands of another traitor. How ironic!"
"The tomb of Fu Yaozi, his birth and death are unknown, because no one gave him money, he sat and watched everything, and finally died without money and food."

(If the Eight Saints really died here, no matter how they died, when future generations come to explore, they will not see the truth, but only believe in the content written on the stone tablet, then Blood Rakshasa's purpose will really be achieved.)

"Wusa Raya and his dog's tomb, this man is a Yan Yun person. Trapped in the Secret Chamber with his beloved dog, the smell of blood from his wounds aroused the dog's appetite, and the man and the dog fought each other, both dying in the martial tomb."
"The tomb of Zhong Yangzi, the head of the Taoist Sect. He tried to understand the Taoist tomb but failed, and died because of his strong resistance to Yin and Yang."
"The tomb of He Gao Fu, a man from the southeast. In the past, he twisted right and wrong, misjudged cases. Today, under my judgment, he cut out his own heart and liver for Yuan Wen Zi and died."
The actions of this great hero... don't seem like a righteous hero at all?

There is a lingering smell of white vine: Humph, how can a righteous hero practice and study magic skills?
"The tomb of Hui Yuan, the head of Shifa Temple. He tried to understand the Buddha's tomb but failed, and died in obsession, hearing the Buddha's reprimand, and scared witless."
Hearing Buddha's rebuke? This story sounds incredibly amazing!

Monks walk uprightly, sit uprightly, naturally not afraid of such boring curses, but this "Hearing Buddha's rebuke" is much more interesting than the stories in the Buddhist scriptures!

"The tomb of Yuan Wen Zi, a man from Zhongzhou. In pursuit of immortality, he studied the Taoist scriptures. He intended to combine the wonders of external and internal alchemy, but ended up taking human organs into the alchemy furnace, a grave mistake with a heavy blood debt."
"Listen to my words, think that you can become an immortal, grateful and tearful, throw yourself into the alchemy furnace, and die in the fire."

This great hero's mouth is really powerful, he actually persuaded this villain to throw himself into the alchemy furnace and die, and before he died, he thanked the great hero for pointing out the way to become an immortal.

There is a lingering smell of white vine: This combination of external and internal alchemy sounds really weird... The so-called external alchemy is to throw various metals and minerals into the alchemy furnace.

The so-called internal alchemy is to regard the human body as a furnace, the human body's meridians as the channels of internal alchemy, and condense the "essence", "qi", and "spirit" into a pill. In fact, it's just a health practice.
To combine these two and come up with the terrifying act of dissecting human organs and throwing them into the furnace in order to refine the pill, this Yuan Wenzi is also a big devil...
What does this external and internal alchemy mean?
The so-called external alchemy is to throw various metals and minerals into the alchemy furnace.

The so-called internal alchemy is to regard the human body as a furnace, the human body's meridians as the channels of internal alchemy, and condense the "essence", "qi", and "spirit" into a "golden pill", which is left in the body.

This Yuan Wenzi had a wild idea, combining the two, thinking of dissecting human organs, throwing them into the furnace, in order to refine the pill, it is really infuriating to both humans and gods, this kind of end is really karma!
What does this external and internal alchemy mean?

Confused, aren't you? Actually, I only understand it roughly myself. That external elixir, it's made by throwing various metals and minerals into a furnace. But consuming it can easily lead to poisoning, so we Taoist Sect don't mess with it anymore.
In plain terms, internal elixir is just a health cultivation technique, treating the human body as a furnace and condensing "essence", "energy", and "spirit" into a "golden elixir".

I don't know if this Yuan Wenzi has damaged his brain by consuming external elixirs, combining the two and coming up with the idea of dissecting human organs and throwing them into a furnace in an attempt to refine elixirs, causing the death of so many people. Such an end is truly the wheel of karma!
"The living tomb of Cai Yuanchang, the head of the Confucius Temple, who was greedy for the art of longevity, succeeded, and was forever trapped in the tomb of longevity."
What's going on? Could the art of Longevity here be real? But it's said that once mastered, one is forever trapped in the Tomb of Longevity. Is there some mystery to this?

"The tomb of Miao Shang Er, a man from the southwestern Jiuli. On the surface a traveling merchant, but wherever he went, he spread plague. When I cornered him, we fought with poison, and he lost and died."
The great hero is actually proficient in toxicology, truly remarkable, truly remarkable.
มีกลิ่นน้ำส้มสายชูขาวจางๆ ที่ไม่จางหายไป: จอมยุทธ์ผู้ยิ่งใหญ่ผู้นี้ยังเชี่ยวชาญศาสตร์พิษอีกด้วย ช่างน่าทึ่ง น่าทึ่งยิ่งนัก

There is a lingering smell of white vine: "The tomb of Jian Chi, the head of the Langya Sword Pavilion, who failed to comprehend the sword tomb and died in a fight with his inner demons."
This reason feels like it was made up on the spot, just to get it over with...

"The tomb of Ming Xiao Sheng, a man from Xiangfan. Born with the ability to read minds, he could read the hearts of those in front of him. He liked to spread rumors and disrupt order, leading people astray and ruining their lives."
But his heart was not made of wood or stone, he also had emotions and desires. He pursued Mo Yitang in vain, and died after being persuaded to give up his wealth."
"The tomb of Tang Taijun, the head of the Beast Manor. He came here in search of dragon scales, but accidentally fell into a pit of poisonous insects and died."
Dragon scales? Dragons? Is it real or fake?

I guess it's a fake, and Tang Taijun saw through it and didn't come. After all, this martial tomb probably doesn't have anything that could attract Tang Taijun's martial arts or anything else, so they had to fake the so-called dragon scales.

"The tomb of Mo Yitang, a man from the Western Regions. An expert in disguise, with a thousand faces. If he met a man, he would become a woman, if he met a woman, he would become a man. He liked to seduce people to cheat money, ruining families. I disfigured his face, and he drowned himself after seeing his own reflection in the sea."

"The tomb of Chu Kuangsheng, the head of the Nine Factions Sect. Because he did not understand Confucianism, Buddhism, and Taoism, he had difficulty understanding the martial arts in them, angrily destroyed the martial tomb, and was killed by the combined efforts of the eight saints and several others."
In the script of Blood Rakshasa, is Chu Kuangsheng a character used to incite internal strife among others?

"The tomb of Gongsun Shuo, a man from the {Nameless Region}. He liked to kidnap people and tie them under the stage to listen to his music, causing them to neglect their work and families to be torn apart. We had a musical duel, and I played a song that made him surrender."

"He helped me catch several thieves, and considering his old age and light crimes, I did not take his life, but punished his Gongsun lineage to guard this tomb generation after generation. I set up his tomb first, waiting for him to rest in this cave after his death."
Is this the only one of the eight thieves who ended well?
No, Blood Rakshasa, this old dog, in order to make room for the eight saints, dug up all the bodies and discarded them in the valley. Including the body of my great-grandfather.
Blood Rakshasa's actions are indeed intolerable.

"The tomb of Yan Gexing, the deputy of the Nine Factions Sect, whose meridians were completely destroyed, came here in hopes of finding a way to recover his strength, but failed to grasp the key points, forcibly practiced martial arts, and died of obsession."
It seems that Blood Rakshasa's view of me is still stuck at the time when my meridians were completely destroyed.
There seems to be some movement behind me!
มีกลิ่นน้ำส้มสายชูขาวจางๆ ที่ไม่จางหายไป: ดูเหมือนว่าจะมีเสียงอะไรด้านหลังข้า!

There is a lingering smell of white vine: It was me who made the noise closing the door.
มีกลิ่นน้ำส้มสายชูขาวจางๆ ที่ไม่จางหายไป: ข้าเป็นคนปิดประตูนั่นแหละ

There is a lingering smell of white vine: It's you! You called me to Penglai Island, I'm here now, there needs to be an explanation about the "Xuan-Yuan Treasure Codex" and the Blood Rakshasa!
มีกลิ่นน้ำส้มสายชูขาวจางๆ ที่ไม่จางหายไป: เป็นเจ้า! เจ้าเรียกข้ามาที่เกาะเผิงไหล ข้ามาถึงแล้ว เรื่องของ "ตำราบัญญัติเซียน" และเรื่องของ รากษสโลหิต ก็ควรจะชี้แจงได้แล้ว!

There is a lingering smell of white vine: Since you found your way here, it means my plan was quite successful.
มีกลิ่นน้ำส้มสายชูขาวจางๆ ที่ไม่จางหายไป: เจ้ามาถึงที่นี่แล้ว แสดงว่าแผนการของข้าประสบความสำเร็จ

There is a lingering smell of white vine: Before you make a move or speak, I need to know one thing: Have the Eight Saints arrived on the island? Are they prepared?
มีกลิ่นน้ำส้มสายชูขาวจางๆ ที่ไม่จางหายไป: ก่อนที่เจ้าจะลงมือหรือเปิดปากพูดสิ่งใด ข้าต้องรู้เรื่องหนึ่งก่อน: แปดเซียนมาถึงเกาะแล้วหรือยัง? พวกเขาเตรียมการป้องกันหรือไม่?

There is a lingering smell of white vine: (Now it's unknown whether he's a friend or foe, I might as well say all eight saints are here. If he's an enemy, it might intimidate him.)
มีกลิ่นน้ำส้มสายชูขาวจางๆ ที่ไม่จางหายไป: (ตอนนี้เราไม่รู้ว่าเขาเป็นศัตรูหรือมิตร จะเป็นการดีกว่าหากข้าเรียกให้ทั้งแปดเซียนมาถึงเสียก่อน ถ้าเขาเป็นศัตรูก็จะสามารถข่มขู่เขาได้)

There is a lingering smell of white vine: Quite a few Sect Leaders are sitting in the main hall, and they are indeed prepared for Blood Rakshasa.
มีกลิ่นน้ำส้มสายชูขาวจางๆ ที่ไม่จางหายไป: มีระดับหัวหน้าหลายคนนั่งอยู่ในห้องโถงหลัก และพวกเขาเตรียมการป้องกันต่อ รากษสโลหิต เรียบร้อยแล้ว

There is a lingering smell of white vine: Then there is a basis for cooperation between you and me.\nAs for the parts of the "Xuan-Yuan Treasure Codex", I have hidden them somewhere and will give them to you after our cooperation ends.
มีกลิ่นน้ำส้มสายชูขาวจางๆ ที่ไม่จางหายไป: ดังนั้นเราสองคนก็มีพื้นฐานในการร่วมมือกัน\nส่วนหนังสือ "ตำราบันทึกของเซียนซวน" ข้าได้เก็บไว้ในที่ลับ จะมอบให้เจ้าหลังจากที่เราร่วมมือกันเสร็จสิ้น

There is a lingering smell of white vine: What cooperation?
มีกลิ่นน้ำส้มสายชูขาวจางๆ ที่ไม่จางหายไป: ร่วมมืออะไร?

There is a lingering smell of white vine: Before that, you should have a lot of questions to ask me. Let's finish our conversation, then talk about cooperation.
มีกลิ่นน้ำส้มสายชูขาวจางๆ ที่ไม่จางหายไป: ก่อนอื่น เจ้าคงมีคำถามมากมายที่จะถามข้า เราควรคุยกันให้จบก่อนดีกว่า แล้วค่อยมาพูดถึงเรื่องความร่วมมือกัน

There is a lingering smell of white vine: I want to ask you...
มีกลิ่นน้ำส้มสายชูขาวจางๆ ที่ไม่จางหายไป: ข้ามีเรื่องที่อยากจะถาม.......

There is a lingering smell of white vine: What is your relationship with Blood Rakshasa?
มีกลิ่นน้ำส้มสายชูขาวจางๆ ที่ไม่จางหายไป: เจ้ามีความสัมพันธ์อย่างไรกับ รากษสโลหิต

There is a lingering smell of white vine: What is Blood Rakshasa's plan?
มีกลิ่นน้ำส้มสายชูขาวจางๆ ที่ไม่จางหายไป: แผนการของ รากษสโลหิต คืออะไร

There is a lingering smell of white vine: What is your plan and purpose?
มีกลิ่นน้ำส้มสายชูขาวจางๆ ที่ไม่จางหายไป: แผนการและวัตถุประสงค์ของเจ้าคืออะไร

There is a lingering smell of white vine: What is the relationship between your family and the stone tablet in the mountain cave?
มีกลิ่นน้ำส้มสายชูขาวจางๆ ที่ไม่จางหายไป: ครอบครัวของเจ้ามีความเกี่ยวข้องอย่างไรกับศิลาจารึกในถ้ำภูเขา

There is a lingering smell of white vine: I'm done asking.
มีกลิ่นน้ำส้มสายชูขาวจางๆ ที่ไม่จางหายไป: ข้าหมดคำถามแล้ว

There is a lingering smell of white vine: According to Wang Bushu, your actions at the Swordsmanship Conference and the sects caused internal strife within Penglai Sect.
มีกลิ่นน้ำส้มสายชูขาวจางๆ ที่ไม่จางหายไป: ตามที่หวางบูซู่กล่าวไว้ เนื่องจากเจ้าไปร่วมการแข่งขันการต่อสู้และก่อเหตุวุ่นวายในสำนักต่างๆ จึงทำให้เกิดความวุ่นวายภายในสำนักเผิงไหล

There is a lingering smell of white vine: And the reason for the internal strife in the Penglai Sect is: they can't find the person who caused the trouble.
Are you really from the Penglai Sect? Are you really a disciple of Blood Rakshasa?
Are you really from the Penglai Sect? Are you really a disciple of Blood Rakshasa?
Correct, Blood Rakshasa is not my master, but my enemy.

When I was eleven, Blood Rakshasa came to my house, intending to ask my grandfather for help. My grandfather refused, so he killed my father. My father's dying blow only slightly injured him... My grandfather still refused, so he killed my mother.
In the end, my grandfather also died at his hands...

When my father reported the arrival of the Blood Rakshasa, my grandfather immediately sealed my mute acupoint, making me unable to speak or move, and then threw me into the wall crevice. And I saw everything...
From now on, I swear I must avenge my grandfather.
(He clenched the jade pendant.)
For my parents!
It seems that we have a common enemy...
After losing his power, Blood Rakshasa has always held a grudge against the Eight Saints. He traveled around, always looking for a way to recover his power.
After countless failures, he decided to follow the path of the great hero. This direction was correct, he succeeded, he found this island.
มีกลิ่นน้ำส้มสายชูขาวจางๆ ที่ไม่จางหายไป: หลังจากล้มเหลวมานับครั้งไม่ถ้วน เขาตัดสินใจที่จะตามรอยเส้นทางที่จอมยุทธ์ผู้ยิ่งใหญ่นั้นเคยเดิน และเส้นทางนี้ถูกต้องแล้ว ในที่สุดเขาก็ทำสำเร็จ เขาได้พบเกาะแห่งนี้

There is a lingering smell of white vine: This island is where the great hero of Chuxiang City chased and killed the eight thieves. He buried the eight thieves here, leaving behind unparalleled martial arts, so this cave is called "Martial Tomb".
มีกลิ่นน้ำส้มสายชูขาวจางๆ ที่ไม่จางหายไป: เกาะแห่งนี้คือสถานที่ ที่จอมยุทธ์ผู้ยิ่งใหญ่แห่งเมืองฉู่เซียงได้ไล่ล่าแปดโจร เขาฝังร่างแปดโจรไว้ที่นี่ และทิ้งยอดเคล็ดวิชาไว้ จึงเป็นที่มาของชื่อถ้ำ "สุสานยุทธ์"

There is a lingering smell of white vine: Although he lost all his power, Blood Rakshasa has many other abilities. He killed all the fishermen here by himself, broke the traps set by my father, unlocked the machinery that sealed the Martial Tomb, and came to the place where you and I are standing.

Here, he found a demonic skill in the "Demon" Martial Tomb that could be learned without power, and he devoted himself to learning it for more than ten years, recovering his power to about 60-70% of his previous level.
With this 60-70% power, he could return to the Central Plains, gather the villains from various places, and make them submit with his domineering methods.
These villains have more or less grievances with the Eight Saints and their sects, so Blood Rakshasa was able to gather them together.

He exterminated the Penglai Sect, which was far away overseas, and planned to impersonate the Penglai Sect, using the name of Shen Yuqiu, the old friend of the Eight Saints and the Sect Leader of the Penglai Sect, to hold a retirement ceremony, as well as the unparalleled martial arts in the Martial Tomb, to attract and deceive the Eight Saints to come.
If you saw the stone tablet on the way, that was something left over from his previous plan.

He altered the sentences and key patterns on the martial tomb, misleading the later learners and making them obsessed. To ensure the effect, he deceived the evil people he gathered to learn and observed the results.

The plan was originally very well prepared, but then an accident happened, forcing him to modify the plan. That is, I impersonated his disciple and made a fuss at the Sword Discussion Conference, forcing him to expose himself ahead of time.

At the same time, he incited internal strife, causing more than half of his subordinates to die. After the Blood Rakshasa came out, he modified the plan overnight, changing from luring into the martial tomb to taking action in the main hall.

The huge gap in personnel, he revised the entire organizational structure, clarified each position's tasks, and even found a lot of small villains to fill in, these people are basically responsible for reception in the sect.

In order to attract the attention of the Vagabonds and distract them from the many flaws, Blood Rakshasa arranged their favorite martial arts competitions and gambling. I heard there's also an auction, but I don't know the details...
The arrangement of the martial arts competition and gambling was indeed effective...

No wonder the whole sect is in a rush and sloppy, but even if the entire "Penglai Sect" is in a mess, Blood Rakshasa can quickly recover the entire sect and rebuild the plan, his methods and skills are worthy of a generation of heroes.
You just said that Blood Rakshasa only recovered six or seven tenths of his strength before leaving the mountain. Why didn't he recover all his strength before leaving?
Because he was stuck at a bottleneck, unable to comprehend the mysteries of the latter half of the demonic skill. That's why he sought out my family.
(He clenched the jade pendant in his hand.)
Your family?
Of course, my goal is revenge.
Over the years, I have been learning martial arts everywhere, tracking Blood Rakshasa's traces, infiltrating and penetrating into it, all for revenge!
I started with the villains gathered by Blood Rakshasa, assassinating, interrogating, lurking, and searching for years, until I found this island.
Their organization is made up of a group of villains forcibly united, with great rifts between them. Killing, intercepting letters, framing, and hiding among them is not a problem for me.

Blood Rakshasa's control over people is indeed clever, he knows how to hide himself. Even if the lower ranks of his organization are wiped out by the government or Vagabond, it won't expose him and the upper ranks.
But if someone knew about his existence from the beginning, his secrecy would be full of vulnerabilities and useless.
Just like this retirement ceremony, if I didn't expose Blood Rakshasa in front of you from the beginning, wouldn't you have foolishly entered the main hall and fallen into the trap?

Although the situation of Penglai Sect being full of flaws made my actions much easier. But if Blood Rakshasa hadn't been exposed from the beginning, I wouldn't have thought of conducting a covert investigation. I wouldn't have been able to touch these flaws at all.

So you impersonated a disciple of Blood Rakshasa, caused a ruckus at the Swordsmanship Conference and the sects, loudly proclaiming his name and Penglai Island. Was your goal to expose the existence of Blood Rakshasa, so we could discover it in advance?
Not bad.
Why didn't you just say it? Wouldn't the Eight Saints help you if you told them directly? Why did you have to offend so many Sect Leaders?
Hmph... Why should I say it directly? After Blood Rakshasa's death, I have quite a few scores to settle with these Sect Leaders!

The internal strife within Penglai Sect was also orchestrated by me... When I was causing trouble at the Swordsmanship Conference and the sects, I said and did a lot of things, a large part of which was not for you to see.
Was it for the internal members of the fake Penglai Sect to see?
Correct, the certain speech habits, tones, unnecessary actions and methods I deliberately displayed were all imitating the conspicuous actions and speech habits of some people inside them.
When the witnesses relayed the news to their ears, mutual suspicion and infighting were inevitable.
They lost almost half of their people in the internal strife, forcing Blood Rakshasa to hastily modify his plan.
Although I don't particularly like you, I must admit that you played your cards well, seizing the right time, place, and people.
The death of so many people was an unexpected bonus for me.
If there wasn't such a big rift between them, I wouldn't have been able to do anything. In the end, it was Blood Rakshasa's failure that gave me an opportunity.

After this plan, my first step was not to return to this island, but to another island of the fake Penglai Sect, which was Blood Rakshasa's logistics and backup place, where the news was blocked. I disguised myself and infiltrated, causing chaos there as well.
This forced Blood Rakshasa himself to take a boat to suppress the chaos, delaying the Golden Basin Handwashing Conference until now, which has not yet been opened.
So this is why the Blood Rakshasa has not been on the island and has not held the golden basin hand-washing ceremony...
What are you doing here now?
The Blood Rakshasa has already broken through the bottleneck of the magic skill, I don't know how far his skill has improved. I'm worried that the Sect Leader who came here is not his opponent.
I need to return here, only by mastering my family's unique skill can I find a way to restrain this person.
(Taps the jade pendant with his knuckles.)
Your family's martial arts?
The name engraved on that stele is my great-grandfather's.
This row of tombstones here are the graves of the eight thieves who were hunted down by the great hero, which is why the great hero named this cave "Martial Tomb".
มีกลิ่นน้ำส้มสายชูขาวจางๆ ที่ไม่จางหายไป: เหล่าศิลาจารึกที่เรียงรายอยู่ ณ ที่นี้ คือป้ายหลุมศพของแปดโจรที่จอมยุทธ์ผู้ยิ่งใหญ่ผู้นั้นไล่ล่า และนี่คือเหตุผลที่จอมยุทธ์ผู้ยิ่งใหญ่เรียกถ้ำแห่งนี้ว่า "สุสานยุทธ์"

There is a lingering smell of white vine: My great-grandfather, Gongsun Shuo, was the only one spared by the great hero.
มีกลิ่นน้ำส้มสายชูขาวจางๆ ที่ไม่จางหายไป: ปู่ทวดของข้า กงซุนซั่ว เป็นเพียงผู้เดียวที่จอมยุทธ์ผู้ยิ่งใหญ่นั้นเมตตาไว้ชีวิตให้

There is a lingering smell of white vine: The great hero punished my great-grandfather by making his descendants guard these graves here. After my great-grandfather passed away, my grandfather and father came here to take his place.
มีกลิ่นน้ำส้มสายชูขาวจางๆ ที่ไม่จางหายไป: จอมยุทธ์ผู้ยิ่งใหญ่ลงทัณฑ์ปู่ทวดของข้า ให้เฝ้าสุสานแห่งนี้สืบไปชั่วลูกหลาน ครั้นปู่ทวดล่วงลับ ปู่และบิดาจึงมาทำหน้าที่แทน

There is a lingering smell of white vine: My grandfather told me that our ancestor was well-versed in the Musical arts, but his son, my grandfather, didn't like Musical and was more interested in the Heart-Viewing Technique of one of the eight thieves, Ming Xiao Sheng.
His grandson, my father, had no interest in Musical or the Heart-Viewing Technique, and was more obsessed with Machinery.

Later, my father fell seriously ill because he couldn't adapt to the local environment. My grandfather chose to break his promise and took my father to run away. The vow was changed from "guard here for generations" to "guard this secret for generations".
So Blood Rakshasa came to your family because of your family's connection with this Martial Tomb...
Perhaps because he had already broken his promise once and felt guilty, my grandfather watched my parents die without saying a word...
That's too extreme, it sounds like your grandfather lived in the era before the unification of the six countries.
After my great-grandfather died, when my grandfather was still guarding the Martial Tomb, the great hero came to visit and gave him some pointers on the Heart-Viewing Technique.
มีกลิ่นน้ำส้มสายชูขาวจางๆ ที่ไม่จางหายไป: หลังจากปู่ทวดของข้าสิ้นชีพ ขณะที่ปู่ยังคงเฝ้าสุสานยุทธ์นี้อยู่ จอมยุทธ์ผู้ยิ่งใหญ่เคยเดินทางมาตรวจดู และยังได้ถ่ายทอดเคล็ดลับสำคัญบางประการเกี่ยวกับวิชา ทรรศนะจิต ให้แก่ปู่ด้วย

There is a lingering smell of white vine: With these pointers and the contents of the Martial Tomb, my grandfather finally understood the Heart-Viewing Technique, even surpassing Mingxiaosheng.

After he understood it, he was greatly shocked for some reason, afraid to learn it, but he couldn't bear to waste his efforts, so he wrote a small booklet called "The True Scripture of Heart-Viewing".
He hid this booklet and didn't let anyone in the family learn it. Anyone who read it without permission would have their tendons cut and be expelled from the family.
In the end, you learned this book to take revenge.
That's correct.
What does this book do?
This is my family's secret technique, I don't want to talk about it.

You just need to know that because I understand "The True Scripture of Heart-Viewing", I can easily maneuver in the "Fake Penglai Sect". And by combining the contents of the book, I can tell which parts of the Martial Tomb have been tampered with.

Those who do not understand the "Heart Sutra" can only learn about 70-80% of the martial arts tomb that has not been tampered with by Blood Rakshasa, such as Blood Rakshasa. But I am here to comprehend all the martial arts tombs and find a way to defeat the enemy.
Now that I have answered your questions, let's talk about our cooperation.
Cooperate?
We have the same enemy, so naturally we have a basis for cooperation.
How do you want to cooperate?
I need someone to guard me while I am comprehending.
What if I don't agree?
Then you can wait here for a while. Because I've locked the gate, and if I die, no one can open this door, whether from inside or outside, you'll be trapped here until you starve to death.
Why do you think I talked so much with you? I was just waiting for the stone door to be completely sealed.

Comprehension of martial arts is always a long-term matter, fast for three to five days, slow for eight to nine years. Blood Rakshasa also counts by year here. And Blood Rakshasa will return to this island to hold a meeting, at the latest today.
I have practiced the "Heart Sutra" myself and already have the basis for interpreting it, so it won't take too long. If we help each other, we can try to get out before Blood Rakshasa comes back.
You actually calculated me, okay...
In that case, come with me, let's do an experiment first.
What kind of experiment is this? Will it harm me?
Okay... you are really vigilant, but it's reasonable.
Uh, wait... why are your tastes so... original?
Why are you staring at me so hard? Taste... can you see any taste from my face?
The things I see are very Origin, there's everything, something's not right... Ornament, Appliance, Book, there must be something you like, right?

The influence of martial arts on the "body" is basic knowledge for every martial artist.

For example, learning horizontal training can make the body strong and invulnerable. Learning Yang-style internal strength can protect Qi, immune to cold and heat. Learning Yin-style internal strength can infiltrate the enemy's body with Yin cold MP.
Learning to harmonize internal strength can resolve abnormalities in the body and recover MP during breathing. Learning Qinggong body technique can make the body light and fast.
That's the influence on the body, what about the influence on the heart?

Those who often use horizontal training are fearless in the face of enemy moves, gradually becoming bold and confident. When making decisions, they tend to choose to solve problems openly and honestly, act bravely, make bold judgments, but also tend to be careless.

Those who often use Yin moves and dangerous moves are careful and fast in response. When making decisions, they tend to wait for the right opportunity. At the same time, they are often too cautious, indecisive, and prone to anxiety and hesitation. But if there is a chance, they like to take risks.

Those who learn military tactics and formations are brave in public battles but timid in private fights. Those who learn long weapons like to keep a distance from people. Those who learn short weapons often lack a sense of boundaries in social interactions.

Among those who learn long weapons, those who are good at shaking spear flowers to charm enemies often change their words and actions. Those who are good at using military formations are also more upright in their actions.
Every martial art you learn is transforming your character, actions, social interactions, planning, etc. This is part of the important content of the "Observing the Heart Sutra".

มีกลิ่นน้ำส้มสายชูขาวจางๆ ที่ไม่จางหายไป: เพลงกระบี่ของอาจารย์ข้าหาผู้ใดเทียมทาน เกรงว่าแม้แต่กระบี่ของจอมยุทธ์ผู้ยิ่งใหญ่ ก็ยังต้องด้อยกว่าสักสามกระบวนท่า

There is a lingering smell of white vine: Although there were some omissions when I first understood the martial tomb, I still got the method to open the demonic martial tomb from Cicada.
Let me see...
It's open!
There's no one here, which is not surprising...
Compared to that, there are more signs of life here.
That's because Blood Rakshasa has been in seclusion here...
Come and see what's written on this wall.
Okay.
The two moved to the stone wall at 25.21 26.21

The wall describes the method of learning demonic skills. First, you need to disperse all martial arts and start over with your meridians. The next step is to break through the heart demon and start over with your heart.

The wall mentions a strange knife specially forged by the great hero.
After mastering the demonic skill, stabbing this knife into the learner's Shen Ting acupoint can cause turmoil in the spirit platform.
When stabbing, if you stare at a person with both eyes, you can quickly master his lifelong Martial Arts.
You can only learn five times at most, otherwise you will die from exhaustion of vitality.
มีกลิ่นน้ำส้มสายชูขาวจางๆ ที่ไม่จางหายไป:
บนผนังกล่าวถึงดาบประหลาดที่จอมยุทธ์ผู้ยิ่งใหญ่ตีขึ้นเป็นพิเศษ
เมื่อฝึกสำเร็จวิชามาร หากใช้ดาบเล่มนี้แทงเข้าจุดเสินถิง ของผู้ฝึก จะทำให้จิตวิญญาณปั่นป่วน
ขณะแทง หากจ้องมองไปยังผู้ใด จะสามารถเรียนรู้วรยุทธ์ทั้งชีวิตของผู้นั้นได้อย่างรวดเร็ว
สามารถเรียนรู้ได้มากที่สุดเพียงห้าครั้ง มิเช่นนั้นจะสิ้นใจเพราะพลังชีวิตเหือดแห้ง

There is a lingering smell of white vine: Blood Rakshasa has lost all his power, it's as if it was prepared for him, no wonder he chose to learn the demonic arts.
Have you ever seen Blood Rakshasa use that knife for self-harm to learn martial arts quickly?
No, you can only learn from five people at most. If it were Me, Me would use it to learn from the eight saints...
Makes sense, so this knife should be hidden somewhere else...
Speaking of which, now that you know the method to learn this demonic art, what do you plan to do? Can you think of a way to restrain it?
I can't think of one, I decided to learn the demonic art, fight fire with fire!
Are you sure? I think the cost is high and it's also very simple.
Cost... doesn't matter. I've come all this way, I've already paid the biggest price...
Even if it's Blood Rakshasa, he should have been in seclusion for a long time, our time may not allow.
Blood Rakshasa has a bottleneck because he doesn't have the "Heart Observation Scripture", but I do, and I have you to help me! You are my biggest help!
Alright! For your words, I'll help you!
Wait a minute, I can't help you here... I can only watch from the sidelines.
Soon, Gongsun Hui lost all his MP.
Soon, he quickly entered the heart demon illusion created by the words inscribed by the great hero with the help of the "Heart Observation Scripture".
มีกลิ่นน้ำส้มสายชูขาวจางๆ ที่ไม่จางหายไป: ในชั่วพริบตา เขาก็อาศัยคัมภีร์ "สัจธรรมหยั่งใจ" ทะยานเข้าสู่ห้วงมายาจิตมารที่ท่านจอมยุทธ์ผู้ยิ่งใหญ่ได้สลักอักขระไว้

There is a lingering smell of white vine: Hmm? That's not right. I can't help you this time.\nThe great hero has fixed the loophole that allowed two people to help each other, now you can only go up by yourself.
มีกลิ่นน้ำส้มสายชูขาวจางๆ ที่ไม่จางหายไป: หืม? นี่ไม่ถูกต้องแล้ว ครานี้ข้าคงมิอาจยื่นมือช่วยเหลือเจ้าได้\nท่านจอมยุทธ์ผู้ยิ่งใหญ่กลับแก้ไขจุดอ่อนที่สามารถให้คนสองคนช่วยเหลือกันได้ บัดนี้เจ้าคงต้องลุยเดี่ยวแล้ว

There is a lingering smell of white vine: The previous martial tomb could help each other, probably the great hero didn't think of your special situation.
มีกลิ่นน้ำส้มสายชูขาวจางๆ ที่ไม่จางหายไป: สุสานยุทธ์คราก่อนยังสามารถช่วยเหลือเกื้อกูลกันได้ อาจเป็นเพราะท่านจอมยุทธ์ผู้ยิ่งใหญ่มิได้คาดคิดถึงสถานการณ์พิเศษเช่นพวกเรากระมัง

There is a lingering smell of white vine: No problem, I don't believe that I can't get through if Blood Rakshasa can!
Woof woof!
This! This is!
Is this asking me to kill them with my own hands...
...This, these are the animals that Gongsun Hui grew up with in his childhood.
That cow was the one I raised when my family was hiding and farming. When I was a child, I often took it to graze. If I wanted to play, it would insist on going home, and I couldn't stop it.

When Blood Rakshasa came, we were having dinner at home. He pulled up a chair and sat down without saying a word. My grandfather ordered my father to kill the cow in our house, saying it was to entertain the guest...
That dog was a big dog that watched me grow up. My mother raised it and forbade it to go out. When I was a child, I rode it. When I grew up a little, it got old and couldn't bear my weight.
When Blood Rakshasa attacked {Me}'s father, the old dog tried his best to pounce on him, but was killed by a twist from Blood Rakshasa...

That Horse was the one my grandfather rode when he was young. When I fled on it, where I rested and where I fled were all decided by it. Later I found out that it could sense where Blood Rakshasa and his henchmen were from far away.
So it helped me avoid many dangers along the way, but in the end...
I sold it to the slaughterhouse for travel expenses.
I've come this far, no matter what stands in my way, I won't be soft!
{Me}... {Me} can't do it...
But if {Me} can't do it, I won't be able to practice the demonic skill and take revenge!
It's not over yet?
Grandfather!
{Me} can't do it... {Me} can't do it!
You... after all, you learned the "Heart Observation Scripture" and came to this demonic martial tomb...
When {Me} took your father and ran away from here, we couldn't escape this island after all...
Perhaps this is the fate left to us by your great-grandfather's sins...
Pick up your knife and show me your determination for revenge!
{Me}... {Me} can't do it...
Get up, there's no way back for you now!
Think about how much you've sacrificed along the way, are you going to back down now!
Little bean, old yellow ox...
The ox lowers its head, looking over its back...
Who's next!
{Me}... {Me} saw it coming!
Good, you can still hold the knife steadily here, you haven't lost the spirit of my Gongsun family!
Don't forget the hatred of the Gongsun surname!
When you were young, you looked like your mother, the more you grow up, the more you look like {Me}.
Although you have the style of your father, how can you cry your eyes out like this?
Hold the knife steady! When you were a child, you made me take the wrong medicine and had diarrhea all night, {Me} didn't dare to beat you hard.
Now that you've grown up and become strong, I need to give you a good beating!
{Me}... {Me} still can't do it...
Your parents never backed down in the face of Blood Rakshasa, are you going to back down?
Why can't you hold the knife steady? Where's the resistance you had when you were a child?
Your mother will support you from heaven...
You're on your own, you have to pull yourself together...
The way to learn this demonic skill is simply inhumane!
What bullshit "break through the heart demon, let the heart start again." It's actually making the learner kill until they become numb, so they can kill others without any scruples?
This is not a martial art that normal people can learn, no wonder it's called a demonic skill!
If it were someone else, {Me} would advise them to stop this inner torment, but brother Gongsun Hui has a deep hatred and is determined, {Me} really can't persuade him...
Wow, are you the grown-up {Me}?
You look a bit different from what {Me} imagined.
How's your martial arts now, can you split a tree with one palm? What's your ranking in the world?
Can you jump onto the roof in one go? Can you eat candied haws every day?
How many bad guys have you killed? Must be a lot, right? Hahaha!
So Gongsun Hui was a chatterbox when he was a kid? He's nothing like that now.
You're too noisy.
Uh...
Um, brother Gongsun, you...
Do you need some quiet? {Me} will step out for a bit.
{Me} have mastered it.
(Gongsun Hui seems to be in good mental state?)
Wait, you've mastered it? In less than a shichen? Didn't you say Blood Rakshasa took several months or even years?
What {Me} have mastered is actually the "Heart Observation Scripture".
This so-called demonic skill is actually the last chapter of the "Heart Observation Scripture".
Now, {Me} have finally mastered it, it's that simple.
So your grandfather didn't allow you to learn the "Heart Observation Scripture" to prevent those who learn it from practicing the last chapter, right...?
What about me? You said I was born with it, it wouldn't have any relations with this demonic skill, right...?
You're different, you can't practice it. Because you've already mastered it, you can't achieve the "Primordial Enlightenment" state required by the first chapter.

Blood Rakshasa only learned the last chapter, and is no longer a threat. Because he didn't practice the previous chapters. The last chapter of the "Heart Observation Scripture", which is also the part learned by Blood Rakshasa, is a martial art that attacks the heart.
Attack the heart? What do you mean?
If you fear him, dread him, feel sorrow, panic, anxiety, or resentment,\nhis moves will be more effective.
On the contrary, if you belittle him, despise him, make yourself happy, confident,\nNot only can it resist his effect, but it can also make him panic, anxious, angry, and lower his own power.
So, all the preparations he made on the island were aimed at the mentality of the Sect Leaders.
And his method of gathering villains... and when he committed murder in my house, it was all about creating a terrifying atmosphere, making people panic and fear before he made his move...
The extremely terrifying atmosphere created by the massacre in the fake Penglai Sect made it easier for him to control his subordinates. This was the main reason for his cleanup method...
I just opened the door to the martial tomb, you can run away at any time.
This key, I found it on the body of a steward who died in the internal strife. I didn't have time to investigate its use, if you have time... you can go to Penglai Sect and see what you can do.
After you run away, I will close this martial tomb door, no one can open it, not even Blood Rakshasa.
Blood Rakshasa can't, how did you do it?
Because my surname is Gongsun.

The door weighs thousands of pounds and will slowly fall. Don't run in during the process, or you'll be trapped inside. If you die before Blood Rakshasa, I will lose an assistant in my revenge, which will be very troublesome.
By the way, when I was comprehending just now, I read the method to open the tomb of Longevity next door. I've already opened it.
I don't know what's inside, anyway, take care of yourself.
Goodbye.
You left really quickly.
There's no one here, which is not surprising...
Maybe because Blood Rakshasa has secluded himself here, there are more signs of life here.
Let me see what the words carved on the wall say.

The words describe the method to learn demonic arts. First, you need to disperse all martial arts and let the meridians start anew. The next step is to break through the heart demon barrier and let the heart start anew.

The wall mentions a strange knife specially forged by the great hero.
After mastering the demonic skill, stabbing this knife into the learner's Shen Ting acupoint can cause turmoil in the spirit platform.
When stabbing, if you stare at a person with both eyes, you can quickly master his lifelong Martial Arts.
You can only learn five times at most, otherwise you will die from exhaustion of vitality.

There is a lingering smell of white vine: The demonic skill has the effect of attacking the mind,\nif you fear him, dread him, feel sorrow, panic, anxiety, or resentment, his moves will be more effective.
On the contrary, if you belittle him, despise him, make yourself happy, confident,\nNot only can it resist his effect, if you can make him panic, anxious, angry, it can also lower his own power.
Blood Rakshasa has lost all his power, it's as if it was prepared for him, no wonder he chose to learn the demonic arts.
I would never choose to disperse my martial arts for this unclear effect and unknown strength of the demonic skill.
But I also got a clue about the Cicada demonic skill from it, which might be useful in the future battles.
This knife is also worth noting, using self-harm to quickly master the martial arts of five people, who would Blood Rakshasa use this knife to learn from?
If it were Me, Me would definitely choose the eight saints. There are only five places, and the eight saints can't even finish learning. Would Me use it to learn from other weaklings?
I also found the method to open the main door and the door to the tomb of Longevity...
What exactly is this Longevity Tomb? I can't help but want to go and see!
Blood Rakshasa was blessed by the heavens here, regained his divine power, endured for years, and finally succeeded in his revenge.
"After years of demon slaying, I have come to understand the demonic arts. Only those who are heartless and ruthless, who are in desperate situations, can learn them."
There are traces of a knife inserted in this stone, but the knife is nowhere to be found... I guess the knife that can absorb power mentioned on the stone wall was originally inserted in this stone.
The air inside feels very turbid... and the atmosphere is very strange...
A blank wall... Could it be that Blood Rakshasa has never been here?
"To seek Longevity, one must give up everything. If you cannot do this, please turn back."
The hero obviously didn't expect the stele to turn around, did he? If I turn back now, wouldn't that mean continuing to go inside?
A blank wall... Could it be that Blood Rakshasa has never been here?
"The so-called Longevity is nothing but a glamorous siege. Mortals seek Longevity, while those who have Longevity seek death."
It sounds a bit terrifying...
Cai Yuanchang practiced the art of Longevity here, withering for three hundred years, and decaying for three hundred years.
Why is there Blood Rakshasa's writing here again? Could it be that he knows how to practice the Longevity technique?
"If you are determined to seek Longevity, light incense in front of the lamp. From then on, you need not eat, only breathe, and enter the path of Longevity."
As soon as I entered, there was a corpse, which scared me so much that I almost fought!
(Calm down a bit.)
Upon closer inspection, isn't this Ding San? How did he get in?
His death was so horrifying... It seems like he suffocated... It looks like he tried his best to run out of here before he died...
If I look at his face again, I'm going to have nightmares tonight! I'd better deal with the body quickly!
Finally dealt with it...
I have a very bad feeling... Up until now, I have had the chance to run away from this place. Do I really want to light incense here?
Light the incense! <color=#097a76>(End the game)</color>
Don't light it!
I have a creepy feeling, it's better not to try.
The stone door outside has fallen!
Let me out!
Unexpectedly, from the inside, there are many inscriptions on the fallen door... It seems to be written by the hero...
Could it be that this was deliberately arranged by the hero? Only when this stone door falls and traps people inside can they see it.
The content on the back of the stone door is roughly a breathing method. It looks like a basic internal breathing technique, but upon closer inspection, it's completely different.

Because the air is isolated, the breather in this room will continuously inhale the air he exhales.
The breathing method on the door uses this secret chamber as the "Microcosmic Orbit" for the learner.
After learning this breathing method, you can combine the "Internal and External Orbits". The learner can use the inhaled and exhaled air as a cycle without suffocation.
And use this air to maintain Longevity, no need for food and drink, can survive for hundreds, thousands, tens of thousands of years, even invincible.
But if the stone door is opened and exposed to the outside air, it will disrupt the balance of the Microcosmic Orbit and die of exhaustion immediately.
Longevity? The Longevity that dies as soon as it leaves this tiny world? This isn't right, isn't this an indefinite prison?
This is not the Longevity I want, let me out!
No, I feel like I can't breathe... Let alone use my power to break this thousand-pound stone door!
If I learn this breathing method, I will never be able to leave this secret chamber. If I don't learn, I will suffocate and die here in no time!
Should I learn it or not?
Practice! As long as the Blue Mountain remains, there's no fear of running out of firewood!
Don't train!
Who can... save me...
I was wrong... I shouldn't have... ignored the risk warning...
Not far from you, in the Penglai Sect, it didn't take long for Blood Rakshasa to appear in the main hall, presiding over his long-planned golden basin washing hands ceremony.
Although the Sect Leaders were prepared, without your crucial assistance, Blood Rakshasa successfully took his revenge.
Soon, this fake sect will be abandoned and turned into ruins, leaving only a legend behind.\nAnd you, {PlayerName}, due to your excellent covert work, there's no trace of you in this legend.

The whereabouts of the legendary {PlayerName} became a mystery,
There were eyewitnesses saying that you went out to sea to live in seclusion, disappearing like a legend, just like a great hero.
Your departure has caused a lot of rumors, some of which are extremely romantic, embodying the Vagabond's illusion of the summit.
Many of your friends have been looking for you everywhere, going out to sea to find you, but in the end they all returned without success.

There is a lingering smell of white vine: Talents emerge in each generation, soon new successors rise to prominence, and you forever become a legend.\nNo one knows that the legendary figure {PlayerName}, lived longer than his own legend.
You are completely trapped in the silent stone Prison,\nfrom hope, to disappointment, to despair, to acceptance, and then to survival.

You don't know what's happening outside, all the grudges of the martial arts world are cut off from you, but you're still alive.\nYou don't know if you should hope for the door to open, when you're torn until you're no longer torn, the door remains silent as usual, and you're still alive.

When every breath you exhale occupies the entire secret chamber, the candle can no longer be lit.
You live in eternal darkness for the rest of your life, but you are still alive.
You gradually lose your senses, no longer feel hungry, even if you don't drink water for several days, you won't feel thirsty, but you are alive.
You try to eat the food in your bag, trying to find the feeling of "fullness", your body is as withered as rotten wood, but you are alive.

You thought about suicide to escape, but you found that you lost the courage to seek death, so you are alive.
So you count the days, hoping that this is a scam, you can die of old age when the time comes.
This is your last hope, you live in disappointment.
But you can't see the sun or the moon, and you soon lose track of time.

Every breath you take makes you dizzy, palpitate, and drowsy.\nYour heartbeat starts to slow down, and the time you spend in slumber gets longer and longer.\nYou always hope that maybe one day, you'll die in your sleep, but every time you wake up, you're still alive.

You gradually stop thinking, stop moving, like you're dead, but you are alive.\nIn this dark secret chamber, you will live, in this half-dead state, you will live.\nUntil the future you can't see, you will always live.
Alive.\nJust alive.\nJust alive.
<size=150%><color="red">Congratulations on your Longevity.</color></size>
As Gongsun Hui said, the stone door is making a vibrating noise, it's estimated that it will fall at any time.
Isn't this... the jade pendant from Gongsun Hui? I saw him always holding it, I thought it was a relic left by his family. How could it be left on this stele?
Could this be his special way of commemorating his parents? Or is this jade pendant a part of the Gongsun family's Machinery?
It doesn't seem like it... It seems like it was thrown away casually... Well, I'd better not interfere, just leave it there.
How did the stone door come down? Did I touch something?
I don't want to go in again, let it fall on its own.
In the meantime, I'll see if I can get Shi Heng's attention...
Did I just see a person in purple clothes run in?
The figure looks like my father...
This! Me didn't have time to go there, and this gate was closed!
Is this person Cai Yuanchang? How did he run up and rush in?
(Could it be... after he was absorbed by Me using the Archdemon's Soul Eating Skill, he wanted to imitate Blood Rakshasa's recovery skill?)
(Or is he still not giving up on Longevity... he is desperate to go to the Longevity tomb?)
(Whether this person masters the demonic skill or Longevity, it will be a disaster for the martial arts world in the future!)
It's just... he's inside now, and the stone door is a thousand pounds heavy... I don't know if he can still come out...
I should see how to contact Brother Shi Heng...
Let me see how to contact Brother Shi Heng...

Okay, you follow Me to the north, the place Horse Pavilion Master found is quite hidden.
You follow Shi Heng to the north of Penglai Island, along the way, you indeed see a large number of corpses abandoned in the valley.
After winding through the woods, you see a boat indeed docked in a hidden and dangerous harbor.

I will consider it carefully.

Young hero {PlayerSurName}, I wanted to paint a scene of many ships welcoming Blood Rakshasa when I saw the scene. Unfortunately, for the sake of concealment, I couldn't find a good angle, what a pity, what a pity.
After the martial arts competition, I wandered around, and the HorsePavilion Master suddenly sought me out, hiring me to protect him.

I originally wanted to compete and go to the main hall to have a look, but following HorsePavilion Master through the mountains and forests, I saw another side of this island and this faction, these villains... It's really eye-opening.
Master of Horse Pavilion, shall we speak frankly? You knew about Blood Rakshasa early on, and you came to investigate him, right?
Alas, this is just an incidental task. My real goal is to paint a good painting. However, someone insisted that I change my route here.
Who is this person you're talking about...?

He's an acquaintance of yours. He was also invited, but he didn't want to come, so he asked me to come. Normally, this kind of thing is handled by someone with the surname Lu, but this time I don't know what excuse he found to dump this task on me.
Forget it, I won't ask anymore, I can't stand you people's secretive nature.
Blood Rakshasa is rushing here in a hurry, and even though you want to act covertly, you still caused some trouble.

When Blood Rakshasa came out of seclusion, he saw that the whole sect was in chaos. The island that was not in charge of logistics was in chaos. Now that he's back from the logistics island, how could he not carefully check all aspects?

But if the famous martial artist {PlayerName} suddenly wants to come to the island and just sits in the main hall waiting for him, these things that need to be checked are all secondary matters, aren't they?

Ah--

Yes, it's great...

You... you are the current Peak of Jianghu, please come in, please come in...
I have urgent matters and don't want to waste time on you, but you can try to stop me.
You... you dare!
It seems that I can't afford to provoke... Forget it...
The gate of the Martial Tomb is tightly closed... I think the most likely place for him to come is here...
What if he opened the door himself, ran in and then closed the door?
Well... anyway, I've looked everywhere else, either he left the island, or he's inside, I have to go in and look.
Although I don't hold out hope, I'll still see if there's a way to open the door on this stele...
Wait, there are some more annotations on the words of the great hero here... they're newly engraved!

I've vowed to become a hero in my life! My greatest wish is to help others when I see injustice, and to be a hero praised by everyone!
Unfortunately, because of my many misfortunes in life, I can't become a hero in this life! But seeing that you are a hero, I'm really happy for you!
I'm leaving! Before I leave, I tried my best to leave you a gift, go in quickly!

Damn it, it's already the supplemented and annotated version of Gongsun Hui, it's already half simpler, can't I still understand it?
If it really doesn't work, forget it... If I don't have the talent for Taoism, I just won't learn.

There is a lingering smell of white vine: I have passed the trial of Yin and Yang Heart Demon, and now fully comprehend this Sword Tomb, realizing how wonderful the great hero's understanding was!
มีกลิ่นน้ำส้มสายชูขาวจางๆ ที่ไม่จางหายไป: ข้าได้ผ่านการทดสอบจิตมารหยินหยางแล้ว บัดนี้เมื่อได้สัมผัสวิชาสุสานยุทธ์ฉบับสมบูรณ์ ข้าจึงได้รู้ว่าการบรรลุของท่านจอมยุทธ์ผู้ยิ่งใหญ่นั้นช่างลึกล้ำเพียงใด!

There is a lingering smell of white vine: The great hero has broken through all the internal skills in the world, I have realized this subtlety, and the enemy's Yin and Yang internal skills can be used by me!
มีกลิ่นน้ำส้มสายชูขาวจางๆ ที่ไม่จางหายไป: ท่านจอมยุทธ์ผู้ยิ่งใหญ่ช่างล่วงรู้เคล็ดวิชาทั่วหล้า ข้าเข้าใจถึงความลึกล้ำนี้แล้ว พลังภายในหยินหยางของศัตรูล้วนสามารถนำมาใช้ประโยชน์ได้!

There is a lingering smell of white vine: Ha! I knew you would come!
Actually, I need your help, but before that, I have something to tell you.

Actually, when you were comprehending the martial tomb before, I was jealous of you for having the innate ability to observe the heart, so I hid the most crucial part of the martial tomb when explaining...
So you only understood the surface, and did not comprehend the true meaning of the great hero's martial tomb.
มีกลิ่นน้ำส้มสายชูขาวจางๆ ที่ไม่จางหายไป: ดังนั้นเจ้าจึงเข้าใจเพียงเปลือกนอก มิได้เข้าถึงแก่นแท้แห่งสุสานยุทธ์ของท่านจอมยุทธ์ผู้ยิ่งใหญ่เลย

There is a lingering smell of white vine: So that's it! I just felt that the true meaning of the Sword Tomb was not fully explained, it turns out that many parts were obscured by you!
But don't worry! Before I left, I corrected all the mistakes in the four martial tombs and added notes! Try to comprehend it again, and you will learn everything!
Sigh... My jealousy towards you and the "Observing Heart Scripture" actually have a great connection...
Do you know? On the day Blood Rakshasa committed the crime, I waited for a long time before I crawled out of the wall in a panic, rode my grandfather's horse, and fled blindly.
Although my grandfather's horse helped me avoid Blood Rakshasa and his men, I was new to the world and encountered human traffickers...

At that time, I was tied up in a horse cart. Taking advantage of the slavers' sleep, I used my teeth to pull out the "Observing Heart Scripture" from my chest, spat it on the ground, and learned the martial arts on it by the moonlight.
This book is indeed very effective. It only took me one and a half shichen to learn a set of internal skills.
While the human traffickers were still asleep, I broke free from the ropes and strangled the two human traffickers. They didn't learn any martial arts, and their struggle was no match for me.
I returned to the place where I was captured and found my horse. Just as I was about to continue my escape, I heard that the news of my family's misfortune had reached here.

After the disaster at my home, the government failed to catch the murderer. But they took all the family property, and the rest was divided by the neighbors. Only a coroner collected the bodies for my parents and grandfather.
I sneaked back home, and the coroner gave me the urns of my parents and grandfather. I poured out the ashes, cleaned the urns, and sold them for money.
Later, I realized what I had done. I was amazed at myself at that time, as if it was not me.
My only remedy was to buy a cheap jade pendant at a stall, deceiving myself that it was my parents' relic, carrying it with me, so that I could slightly calm my conscience.
I am such a hypocritical and ridiculous beast.
Sold the urn of my parents and grandfather's ashes? I've lived for more than a decade, and I can't imagine this is something a human would do...
Could this be caused by the "Observing Heart Scripture"?
Hahaha! You're still here!
Do you know? Although I encountered a disaster, my journey was rough, but beyond the roughness, I still had some happy days!
During my wandering days, I met a brother who was also wandering! His name is Dashan, because his parents were killed by the Yan army, he had to wander.
A lady who runs a martial arts gym adopted us two! She provided me with food and clothing, and also taught me martial arts!
She also has a daughter, about the same age as me! Her name is Xiaoyu, she was so good to me! During that time, even though I could see her every day, I still often dreamed of her!
Although Dashan joined a small sect a year later, that time was the only happy time besides when my parents and grandfather were still alive!
But about three years later, the villain came back, and I recognized him at a glance.
He was the one who followed Blood Rakshasa to my house, the one who killed my parents after Blood Rakshasa had his way.
That night, I ran to the river outside the city and took out the "Heart Observation Scripture" that I had never touched again.
When I returned to the martial arts school, they were waiting for me to come back for dinner.
I first killed the uncle with a single slash, from shoulder to ribs.
Then I cut off the aunt's stick, and her neck.
Finally caught up and stabbed the little fish in the back.
During this process, I felt nothing. For the next few months, I never thought of them, the death of the old lady and the little fish, like a drop of water disappearing into the water.
But one day when I woke up, the bloody faces of the old lady and the little fish suddenly appeared before my eyes, staring at me.
No matter if I look at my hand, look in the mirror, or stare at the sun, they are always blocking my view.
Then I had nightmares continuously, until I practiced the "True Scripture of Observing the Heart" today, and finally got rid of the nightmare.
I first cried for a month, was scared for a month, and then I started to hate them.
I told myself, I did nothing wrong! I did nothing wrong! If the disaster does not affect their descendants, why did they want to kill my whole family in the first place?
But since then, I dare not touch the "True Scripture of Observing the Heart" anymore.
I can't say that Gongsun Hui's actions were wrong at the time, I can only say that the world is so cruel...
Actually, I treated you as a brother! After all, in this world, only you and I understand the Heart Observation!
Speaking of brothers, I met my brother Dasha many years later! Do you know how happy I was! He is the only one who truly cares about me after the aunt and the little fish!
Do you know where? It's on Penglai Island, in the martial tomb!
The small sect he joined was incorporated by Blood Rakshasa! Arranged on Penglai Island! When I sneaked in, I was so happy when I found him!
I told him about my life and hatred, and he immediately forgot about the horror of Blood Rakshasa and wanted to help me sneak into the martial tomb!
Without his help, I couldn't get in by myself!
Later, the two of us sneaked in! He couldn't understand the martial tomb and the stele, but I found that the principles in it were the same as the "Heart Observation Scripture"!

I picked up the "Heart Observation Scripture" and understood a lot of the true meaning of the martial tomb! Dasha was also very happy, and promised to teach him these, and then he would help me take revenge!

Unfortunately, I didn't have time to finish reading it all, and I heard a noise at the stone door. It turned out that Penglai Island found that the martial tomb was invaded, and Blood Rakshasa himself came directly!
I was not Blood Rakshasa's opponent at the time... but fortunately I knew where to escape!
But escaping from the martial tomb does not mean escaping from Penglai Island, because Penglai Island is now undergoing a full search.
The best way is to let the invaders be caught, so that the search can be stopped. Then I can escape from Penglai Island.
And Dasha is the most suitable, because I believe he will not betray me, and he also believes that I will not abandon him.
So I didn't tell Dashan how to escape, I just hid and watched him in the dark, being killed by Blood Rakshasa, and then escaped from the Martial Tomb.
Since then, I have accepted that I am a person who is unkind, unrighteous, disloyal, and unfilial. I no longer resist the "Heart Observation Scripture" and start to learn without hesitation.
I didn't expect Gongsun Hui... to be ruined by the "Heart Observation Scripture"...
So why would the current Gongsun Hui leave these messages for me?
Thank you for listening to this point! This is the last part of my story!
To be honest! I really can't bear to leave you! Can't bear to leave here! But I have to go, I can't hold on anymore!
Do Me hate Blood Rakshasa? That's a thing of the past. Me don't hate him, but want to kill him, just because Me remember that I should take revenge.
Later, I started to be unscrupulous, these methods surprised me! I chose Penglai Sect, and let them be exterminated!
Me caused trouble at the Sword Discussion Conference, causing many people who were very good to Me to fight each other!
Me attracted all the eight saints to the island, hoping to learn their skills quickly!
Quick learning... skills? Is it the knife of the demonic skill?
You guessed it! The knife of the magic skill is actually in my hand!
When you see these words, Me should have successfully taken revenge, and learned their lifelong Martial Arts without anyone noticing!

I have found a new goal after revenge! That is to become the Jianghu Conqueror! As long as I kill the Sect Leader on the island, and you, the obstacles on the road to becoming the Jianghu Conqueror will be cleared!
And the plan of Blood Rakshasa just gathers you all here, it's a godsend!
Do you know? Just now, I was in the Martial Tomb, and when I knew you had a natural heart-watching eye, I was so happy because you could help me take revenge!
In addition to the hatred of Blood Rakshasa, I have a deep hatred! You must help me!
If you listen to my four stories, you already know how to open the Magic Martial Tomb!
Please enter the Magic Martial Tomb.
Kill Gongsun Hui.
For the aunt, for the little fish, for the big mountain, for the entire Penglai Sect, and...
Take revenge for me.
The one who left me a message... was it the young Gongsun Hui who was killed when Gongsun Hui learned magic skills?
My original wish was always to be a hero, a hero who would help when seeing injustice, never to kill other Sect Leaders and become the Jianghu Conqueror!
Jianghu Conqueror is not his end... If he becomes Jianghu Conqueror, the entire martial arts world will be devastated!
For the sake of me helping you comprehend... brother, avenge me...
No... I have to... keep going, I have to leave a message... on the stone tablet outside the Martial Tomb...
Uh, although Gongsun Hui has made up for all the mistakes, I didn't successfully comprehend the martial tomb before, so naturally I can't understand the true meaning in it!
In that case, I have to try again!
Damn it, it's already the supplemented and annotated version of Gongsun Hui, it's already half simpler, can't I still understand it?
